trans-unit.source: Defines a segment of time that may contain child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 定義一段時間可能包含子<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: These child timelines become active according to their respective <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這些子時刻表變成作用中，根據其各自<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>

trans-unit.source: Also, child timelines are able to overlap (run in parallel) with each other.
trans-unit.target: 此外，子時刻表就能夠彼此重疊 （平行執行）。

trans-unit.source: ParallelTimeline objects can be children (nested inside) of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: ParallelTimeline 物件可以是子系 （巢狀方式置於） 的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: This can provide better encapsulation of timing sequences in complex animations.
trans-unit.target: 這可以提供更好的封裝，將複雜的動畫時間序列。

trans-unit.source: ParallelTimeline has its own <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> property therefore all child timeline <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> values are relative to the parent ParallelTimeline value for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ParallelTimeline 都有它自己<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>屬性因此所有子系時間軸<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>的值為相對於父<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> ParallelTimeline 值</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref>指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>類別

trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref>類別具有指定<> *> 和<> *>。

trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>

trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref>類別具有指定<> *>， <> </> *>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of this <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的執行個體，這個<xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Return the natural duration (duration of a single iteration) from a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回自然持續期間 （持續時間的單一的反覆項目），從指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A natural duration is the period of a single iteration.
trans-unit.target: 自然持續期間是單一的反覆項目。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> it means that the natural duration is unknown.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法傳回<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>則代表自然持續期間是未知。</xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> is determined by the author.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>作者所決定。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the duration of streaming media would be determined by the provider of the streaming media.
trans-unit.target: 例如，進行媒體串流處理的持續時間會決定串流處理媒體的提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> to return the natural duration from.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref>傳回自然持續期間。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Duration"></xref> quantity representing the natural duration.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Duration"> </xref>代表自然持續期間的數量。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how this timeline will behave when one or more of its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> children slips.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定這個時間軸會如何行為，當一或多個其<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref>子系順延。

trans-unit.source: It is often desirable to synchronize animations and media.
trans-unit.target: 它通常會同步處理動畫和媒體。

trans-unit.source: However, this is complicated by the fact that media playback can be delayed by loading or buffering making it difficult to reliably play an animation along with media.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這 cross-frame 播放該媒體可能會因為延遲載入或緩衝處理，因此很難可靠地播放動畫和媒體。

trans-unit.source: The SlipBehavior property is used to determine what happens when media and animations are played together.
trans-unit.target: SlipBehavior 屬性用來判斷一起播放媒體和動畫時會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> (default) specifies that animation timelines do not need to be synced and will play when specified regardless of the state of other media in the timeline.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>（預設值） 指定動畫時間軸不需要進行同步處理，而且會在指定時間軸中的其他媒體狀態而時播放。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> on the other hand, specifies that an animation will wait (slip) until media is ready to play.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>相反地，指定動畫會等候 (slip)，直到已準備好要播放的媒體。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>

trans-unit.source: The diagrams below illustrate this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 下圖說明這項行為。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> plays a video and an animation.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>播放視訊及動畫。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: When SlipBehavior is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> grows to play all media and animations.
trans-unit.target: 當 SlipBehavior 設為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>設為<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>增大，以播放所有媒體與動畫。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: Key for SlipBehavior diagram](~/add/media/slipbehaviorkey.png "Diagram: Key for SlipBehavior diagram") ![Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow1.png "Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow") This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> has a SlipBehavior of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> of 5 seconds which gives media and animations 5 seconds to play regardless of how much they slip.
trans-unit.target: ![圖表︰ SlipBehavior 圖表機碼](~/add/media/slipbehaviorkey.png "圖表︰ SlipBehavior 圖表的索引鍵")![圖表︰ SlipBehavior 屬性值為 Grow](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow1.png "圖表︰ SlipBehavior 屬性值為 Grow")這<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>具有的 SlipBehavior<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>提供媒體和動畫 5 秒播放不論它們略過多少 5 秒。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow2.png "Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow") This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> has a SlipBehavior of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: ![圖表︰ SlipBehavior 屬性值為 Grow](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow2.png "圖表︰ SlipBehavior 屬性值為 Grow") <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>具有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>的 SlipBehavior</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>此

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation> (and any other non-media children of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>) does not progress unless the media timeline is also progressing.
trans-unit.target: 請注意， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation>(和任何其他非媒體子系<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>) 不會不會進行，除非也逐漸媒體時間軸。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation>

trans-unit.source: If the media takes a while to load, or if it is buffering, the animation will wait (slips) with it.
trans-unit.target: 如果媒體花的時間才能載入，或正在緩衝，動畫會在等候 （滑動） 與它。

trans-unit.source: This allows animations to synchronize with a single media file.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓與單一媒體檔案同步處理的動畫。

trans-unit.source: ![SlipBehavior diagram for media and animation](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip1.png "SlipBehavior diagram for media and animation") This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> has a SlipBehavior of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> of 5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: ![媒體和動畫的 SlipBehavior 圖表](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip1.png "媒體和動畫的 SlipBehavior 圖表")這<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>具有的 SlipBehavior<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>5 秒。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the media file and animation are guaranteed to play for 5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，媒體檔案和動畫保證都能播放的 5 秒。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: SlipBehavior property of a Storyboard](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip2.png "Diagram: SlipBehavior property of a Storyboard") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![圖表︰ 分鏡腳本的 SlipBehavior 屬性](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip2.png "圖表︰ 分鏡腳本的 SlipBehavior 屬性") # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates how this timeline will behave when one or more of its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> children slips.
trans-unit.target: 值，指出這個時間軸會如何行為，當一或多個其<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref>子系順延。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別項<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
